htmlTag.name: HTML Tag
htmlTag.description: The HTML tag to use for the heading. Defaults to `h2`.

size.name: Size
size.description: The size of the heading. Defaults to `large`.

color.name: Color
color.description: A Tailwind CSS class describing the color of the heading text. Defaults to `text-black`.

headingClasses.name: Heading Classes
headingClasses.description: Any additional classes to add to the heading.

uppercase.name: Uppercase
uppercase.description: Whether the heading text should be uppercased.
